page.title: 03EDUCATION PAISLEY
page.content: {Todholm Primary}is the only{Infant {School}left in the Division.It accommodates children from Nursery to Primary Three,after which the pupils transfer to either Lochfield, Williamsburgh or South Primaries. Its capacity is 97 and the present roll is 68. {Lochfield Primary}was originally a Junior Secondary School.It is located in Quarry Road but the original building was on the present site of the Bowling Green in Lochfield Road. It was opened in 1930 with a capacity of 400 children.The present roll is 238. {South Primary School}was opened in 1876 as a Junior Secondary. A{ {replacement school}is at present being built on the{open-plan}model.The capacity of the new building will be 300 pupils,projected roll is 266.
